overview:
Rupert Hurley is a seasoned business development professional and internet entrepreneur, with 20 years b2b sales and 10+ years direct e-commerce experience under his belt.

In 2000, Rupert set up casevalue.com, one of the first on-line wine merchants in the UK. This expanded into a corporate on-line gift delivery business which served companies including American Express Centurion, Morgan Stanley and Disney to name but a few of their “blue chip” client base.

In June 2010, Rupert followed a long held dream of starting a company specialising in delivering digital content to mobile devices and founded digitalle.com with Lance Keay, a veteran e-commerce platform developer, whom he had worked with on and off over the previous 10 years.

Together, they are creating a “cloud based”, enterprise digital content management and delivery system which also incorporates social media and networking functionality to provide a 360 degree platform to publishers and content owners and creators. This will be provided via their Paperlesse and Socialle brands.

His dream of being able to read the news in a hand held, ‘flexible’ device, “…like a thin sheet of plastic but with video and content delivered wirelessly…”, is getting ever nearer, and he intends to be at the front of the queue in being a part of that revolution.
